page.title: 09School
page.content: I walk to school through the waste ground and when I arrive I talk with my friends until it is time to line up and go inside.First there is an assignment of work on the board to do while we answer the register.Then we line up for assembly where we sing a hymn.After this the class begin their individual projects written about a particular person or country.At 10a.m. we go to the Music/French room.We repeat work we know and then learn new words.At 10.30 we go out to play for 20 minutes.After play we begin Maths using Fletcher books.We learn about the things that we are not too good at Dinnertime begins at 12.15.After dinner we have games.We have the choice of cricket,rounders or volley ball.At 2.30 we look at World Religions.When it is 3.30 we go home.
